name: Extreme Drift Track: Car Chall
description:
Extreme Drift Track: Car Challenge is a new, exciting racing car driving sim game. Race super fast remote control sports cars and speed on toy racetracks and stunts spread all through the house
Features:
• Sharp and narrow impossible racing tracks to ride.
• Marvelous 3D game graphics and realistic views.
• Nitro boost to perform insane acrobatic stunts.
• Smooth controls and easy gameplay.
• High Quality sounds.
• Different camera views to make simulation driving easy.
• Best sports cars collection.
